title: Reconstruct a 2-Row Binary Matrix
content:
Given the following details of a matrix with  columns and 2 rows :

The matrix is a binary matrix, which means each element in the matrix can be 0 or 1.
The sum of elements of the 0-th(upper) row is given as .
The sum of elements of the 1-st(lower) row is given as .
The sum of elements in the i-th column(0-indexed) is , where  is given as an integer array with length .

Your task is to reconstruct the matrix with ,  and .
Return it as a 2-D integer array.
If there are more than one valid solution, any of them will be accepted.
If no valid solution exists, return an empty 2-D array.
